org.apache.http.client.params
Class HttpClientParams

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.http.client.params.HttpClientParams

@Immutable
public class HttpClientParams
extends Object

An adaptor for manipulating HTTP client parameters in HttpParams.

4.0
